name: Room-1
detail: Our Hostel rooms are clean and ventilated & well-maintained, free of dust and clutter, with adequate airflow through windows or vents, promoting a fresh and healthy environment.

name: Room-2
detail: A student hostel room is a compact living and study space featuring essential furniture, basic storage, and access to shared amenities, designed to balance privacy and community living affordably.

name: Attached Washroom
detail: Each Room in our hostel have a clean & attached washroom.

name: Window View
detail: Every single room of our hostel have windows and personal balcony for proper ventilation and fresh air.

name: Common Hall
detail: A common hall in student accommodation serves as a shared space for socializing, studying, and group activities, fostering community and collaboration among residents.

name: Roof-Top View
detail: The rooftop view of student accommodation offers a scenic overlook, providing a refreshing space for relaxation and panoramic vistas of the surrounding area.
